Qualities of gentlemen who went forth fr: Not restless, insolent, fickle, scurrilous, and loose-tongued
Guard their sense doors and eat in moderation
Care about the ascetic life and keenly respect the training
Not indulgent or slack, nor are they leaders in backsliding, neglecting seclusion
Mindful, with situational awareness, immersion, and unified minds; wise, not stupid.
